title: 820-2390-a no power but green light on charger
message:
Hi. i have board with i can't fix it myself and need some help. i watched Louis video about  bad capacitor but i have voltage  on L7770 pin 2
PP1V05_S5_MCP  -  1.10v but  PP5V_S3 is  0.00v and board don't powering up. Can anybody help me here?

title: 820-2390-a no power but green light on charger
message: i have 3.4v  on pin 21 on u7201 but on pin 4 u7201 is 0.00v

title: 820-2390-a no power but green light on charger
820-2390-a no power but green light on charger
message: Have you gone down the rest of the power rails to see what is missing? When you hit the power button on the keyboard does PM_SLP_S4_L pulse for a second? You might need a second set of hands for this.

title: 820-2390-a no power but green light on charger
message: no i checked only to PP5V_S3 no more. i will check rest now. thx

title: 820-2390-a no power but green light on charger
message:
PM_SLP_S4_L no puls when i press power button

PP5V_S0 -3.61v

PPVCORE_S0_CPU - 0.00v
PP3V3_S5 - 3.34v
PP3V3_S3 - 0.00v  
PP2V5_S0 - 0.00v
PP1V2_S0 - 0.00v
PP1V8_S0 - 0.00v
PP1V8R1V5_S3 - 0.01v
PPMCPDDR_ISNS - 0.02v

title: 820-2390-a no power but green light on charger
message: Is PP3V3_G3_RTC present? What is the history of this, water, drop, or something else? This could really be anything at this point, needs some more information to be able to advise. No PM_SLP_S4_L pulse could be almost anything.
